overview: Anthony and Dolores Montelli, along with their four children, move into their dream house in Amityville and are immediately plagued by a string of paranormal experiences. When the abusive Anthony wrongly places the blame on their children, physically lashing out at both them and Dolores, she recruits a local Catholic priest to exorcise the house.
tagline: In "The Amityville Horror", the Lutzes got out of this house alive. This family was not so lucky.
cast: James Olson|Burt Young|Rutanya Alda|Jack Magner|Andrew Prine
